issue.title: [CF 1338] Group 1-40 Missing buffs not working in instances
issue.body:
What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
I'm trying to show my lifebloom icon whenever my lifebloom is about to expire or is not present. This is working fine outside of an instance, but once I'm in an instance it stops working with the Group 1-40 target which is supposed to work in raid and party.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
8.2.2

Do you have an error log of what happened?
No

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)
^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SUnit^Sgroup~`1-40 ^SDurationMin^N5 ^SType^Sbuffcheck ^SName^SLifebloom ^SShowTimerText^B ^SDurationMaxEnabled^B ^SEvents^T ^N1^T ^SType^SAnimations ^SAnimation^SACTVTNGLOW ^SEvent^SOnShow ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^SStates^T ^N1^T ^t^N2^T ^SAlpha^N1 ^t^N3^T ^t^N4^T ^t^t^SOnlyMine^B ^SEnabled^B ^SDurationMax^N5 ^t^N82201^S~`~| ^Sicon^^


> Posted by CurseForge user Xaldeonz | Imported from CurseForge issue #1338 | Raw

comments.body:
Doesn't seen to work when I'm in a party or raid either. Only when I'm by myself.


> Posted by CurseForge user Xaldeonz
